mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, bir, province, city, area,email, phone, face, sex, created_user createdUser, created_time createdTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime from t_user where username=#{username}

select id, username, password, nickname, bir, province, city, area,email, phone, face, sex, created_user createdUser, created_time createdTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime from t_user where email=#{email}

select id, username, password, nickname, bir, province, city, area,email, phone, face, sex, created_user createdUser, created_time createdTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime from t_user where phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update t_user set email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, nickname=#{nickname}, face=#{face}, sex=#{sex}, bir=#{bir}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, area=#{area} where id=#{id}
